ModMetaData.name: Unarmed Alert
ModMetaData.author: 1trickPwnyta
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an alert to the game (right side of the screen) when you have one or more colonists who are unarmed. Ignores non-violent, imprisoned, or downed colonists. Settings allow you to include or ignore guests and slaves.
=== Updates === 04/10/2024: Add settings to include or ignore guests and slaves 04/10/2024: Ignore guests
